mods.name: Networking Fix
mods.description: Stops Scrap Mechanic client from stalling packets. Fixes pretty much all the networking issues.

mods.name: Proximity Voice Chat
mods.description: A Scrap Mechanic DLL mod which adds the Proximity Voice Chat into the game

mods.name: Better Paint Tool
mods.description: A DLL mod for Scrap Mechanic which enhances the functionality of the vanilla Paint Tool and allows you to pick any color you want!

mods.name: Dynamic Sun
mods.description: A Scrap Mechanic DLL mod which makes the sun dynamic by letting you adjust the angle!
